entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
